artefact: Licence to release non-native animals (England, Scotland and Wales)

artefact.overview: You need a licence to release non-native animals and plants into the wild
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to release non-native animals and plants into the wild.
artefact.licence_overview: To release non-native animals and plants into the wild, you need a licence from [Natural England](http://www.naturalengland.org.uk/ "Natural England"){:rel="external"} or the [Food and Environment Research Agency (Fera)](http://www.fera.defra.gov.uk/ "Food and Research Research Agency (Fera)"){:rel="external"} (for the release of biological control agents only) in England, the [Scottish Government Agricultural Department](http://www.scotland.gov.uk/Topics/farmingrural/Agriculture "Scottish Government Agricultural Department"){:rel="external"} in Scotland and the [Environment, Planning & Countryside Department](http://wales.gov.uk/topics/environmentcountryside/?lang=en "Environment, Planning & Countryside Department"){:rel="external"} in Wales.
